title: Explained: How US' New Missile Will Be A Game-Changer In Indo-Pacific
content: The US has deployed its new long-range air-to-air missile that could potentially disrupt the balance of power in the Indo-Pacific in the US-China 'Cold War'.
summary: The US has deployed its new long-range air-to-air missile that could potentially disrupt the balance of power in the Indo-Pacific in the US-China 'Cold War'.

title: Japan Scrambles Jets After China Aircraft "Volates" Airspace
content: Japan scrambled fighter jets after a Chinese military aircraft "violated" Japanese airspace, the defence ministry said Monday.
summary: Japan scrambled fighter jets after a Chinese military aircraft "violated" Japanese airspace, the defence ministry said Monday.

title: Russia Hit Ukraine With Over 100 Missiles, Around 100 Drones: Zelensky
content: President Volodymyr Zelensky said Monday that Russia had carried out strikes on Ukraine using more than 100 missiles and around 100 drones.
summary: President Volodymyr Zelensky said Monday that Russia had carried out strikes on Ukraine using more than 100 missiles and around 100 drones.

title: Video: Elon Musk Shares Rare Glimpse Of Tesla's Cortex AI Supercluster
content: Billionaire Elon Musk has shared a rare glimpse into the inner workings of Tesla's latest innovation - Cortex, a cutting-edge AI training supercluster being built at Tesla Headquarters in Austin.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk has shared a rare glimpse into the inner workings of Tesla's latest innovation - Cortex, a cutting-edge AI training supercluster being built at Tesla Headquarters in Austin.

title: Video: Russian Skyscraper Hit By Ukrainian Drone In 9/11-Like Attack
content: A Ukrainian drone strike on a residential building in Saratov, Russia, has drawn chilling comparisons to the 9/11 attacks, as video footage of the incident circulates on social media.
summary: A Ukrainian drone strike on a residential building in Saratov, Russia, has drawn chilling comparisons to the 9/11 attacks, as video footage of the incident circulates on social media.

title: "Don't Want To Increase Tensions With Israel, But...": Iran Minister
content: Iran does not seek to increase Middle East tensions, Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi told his Italian counterpart Antonio Tajani, adding that its response to the killing of the Hamas chief in Tehran would be "definite and calculated".
summary: Iran does not seek to increase Middle East tensions, Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi told his Italian counterpart Antonio Tajani, adding that its response to the killing of the Hamas chief in Tehran would be "definite and calculated".

title: Uber Fined $324 Million In Netherlands For Sending Drivers' Data To US
content: The Dutch data protection watchdog said Monday it hit ride-hailing app Uber with a 290-million-euro ($324 million) fine over the transfer of personal data of European drivers to US servers.
summary: The Dutch data protection watchdog said Monday it hit ride-hailing app Uber with a 290-million-euro ($324 million) fine over the transfer of personal data of European drivers to US servers.

title: 1 Dead, 2 Missing After Ice Cave Collapses In Iceland
content: One person has died and two others were still missing a day after an ice cave collapsed in southeast Iceland while a tour group was visiting the area, police said Monday.
summary: One person has died and two others were still missing a day after an ice cave collapsed in southeast Iceland while a tour group was visiting the area, police said Monday.

title: How A 'Wrong Turn' Led West Bank Settlers To Attack Arab-Israeli Family
content: Lamis al-Jaar says she can hardly sleep at night after hardline Jewish settlers violently assaulted her and four other members of her Israeli Bedouin family, sparking outcry across the country.
summary: Lamis al-Jaar says she can hardly sleep at night after hardline Jewish settlers violently assaulted her and four other members of her Israeli Bedouin family, sparking outcry across the country.

title: Spanish Actor's Son Charged With Killing, Decapitating Surgeon In Thailand
content: A Thai court will sentence Thursday a famed Spanish actor's son charged with murdering and dismembering a Colombian plastic surgeon he met online.
summary: A Thai court will sentence Thursday a famed Spanish actor's son charged with murdering and dismembering a Colombian plastic surgeon he met online.

title: North Korean Ballistic Missiles Have Range Of 110 Km, Aimed At Seoul
content: Ballistic missile launchers that North Korea has said it plans to deploy on the border with South Korea are believed to have a range of 110 km (68 miles), allowing them to target Chungcheong Province south of Seoul, the Yonhap news agency reported.
summary: Ballistic missile launchers that North Korea has said it plans to deploy on the border with South Korea are believed to have a range of 110 km (68 miles), allowing them to target Chungcheong Province south of Seoul, the Yonhap news agency reported.

title: Philippines Confirms 2 New Mpox Cases, Says They Are "Milder Variant"
content: The Philippines has confirmed two more mpox virus infections of the milder clade 2 variety, its health ministry said Monday, bringing the number of active cases to three.
summary: The Philippines has confirmed two more mpox virus infections of the milder clade 2 variety, its health ministry said Monday, bringing the number of active cases to three.

title: Explained: Ukraine's Incursion Into Russia, How Much They Have Gained
content: Ukraine's incursion into Russia, which entered a third day Thursday, appears to be an unprecedented assault which experts say could aim to draw Russian resources away from other areas or to undermine morale.
summary: Ukraine's incursion into Russia, which entered a third day Thursday, appears to be an unprecedented assault which experts say could aim to draw Russian resources away from other areas or to undermine morale.

title: Opinion: Kamala Harris, Sunak, Obama, And Their Struggle To Truly 'Belong'
content: Kamala, in essence, is yet another example of how across the West, even if political leaders of colour manage to reach the top, they find themselves operating within systems dominated by White leaders.
summary: Kamala, in essence, is yet another example of how across the West, even if political leaders of colour manage to reach the top, they find themselves operating within systems dominated by White leaders.

title: What UK's 102-Year-Old Skydiver Said After Jumping From 7,000 Feet
content: A 102-year-old woman in Britain opted for a unique birthday celebration this year. On August 25, Manette Baillie, who was once married to a paratrooper and served in the Women's Royal Naval Service during World War II, skydived out of a plane.
summary: A 102-year-old woman in Britain opted for a unique birthday celebration this year. On August 25, Manette Baillie, who was once married to a paratrooper and served in the Women's Royal Naval Service during World War II, skydived out of a plane.

title: Prince Harry Is "An Angry Boy, Desperately Misses UK," Says His Friend
content: Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle have been in the United States for over four years, but looks like the Duke of Sussex is still struggling to make it his new home.
summary: Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle have been in the United States for over four years, but looks like the Duke of Sussex is still struggling to make it his new home.

title: Viruses Can Work Against Antibiotic-Resistant Bacteria, New Research Shows
content: As the globe faces a rise in antibiotic-resistant bacteria making traditional antibiotics ineffective specific viruses could offer a solution.
summary: As the globe faces a rise in antibiotic-resistant bacteria making traditional antibiotics ineffective specific viruses could offer a solution.

title: Groom, His Cousin Killed In New York Car Crash One Day Before Wedding
content: The groom and his cousin were celebrating his bachelor party when their car was hit head-on by a pickup truck travelling in the wrong direction.
summary: The groom and his cousin were celebrating his bachelor party when their car was hit head-on by a pickup truck travelling in the wrong direction.

title: Lenovo Worker Fired For Urinating In Hotel Lobby, Sues For $1.5 Million
content: A Lenovo computer salesman has found himself in a swirl of trouble, fired from his job after he says a bladder condition forced him to relieve himself in a lobby of his Times Square hotel.
summary: A Lenovo computer salesman has found himself in a swirl of trouble, fired from his job after he says a bladder condition forced him to relieve himself in a lobby of his Times Square hotel.

title: Prince Harry Has Found A New "Father Figure" In US. He Is A Music Mogul
content: Prince Harry has found a new mentor and "father figure" in Canadian music icon David Foster, according to sources close to the pair, The Times reported.
summary: Prince Harry has found a new mentor and "father figure" in Canadian music icon David Foster, according to sources close to the pair, The Times reported.
